Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Player class stores the team, player type, name , and curent hand of each player. Contains methods for hand management, accessor functions for instance variables, and AI functions for cpu to make decisions on card choices / trump calling

      • playCard

        public Card playCard(char lead,
                     int order,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Card> trick,
                     char trump,
                     java.util.ArrayList<Card> played)
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        hub function that determines what card a player will play. Diverges into seperate functions for human and computer players
        Parameters:
        lead - the lead suit
        order - what position player is playing from
        trick - cards that have been played earlier in the trick
        trump - the trump suit
        played - cards that have been played earlier in the round
        Returns:
        the card that is being played
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • trumpFirstRound

        public boolean trumpFirstRound(char suit,
                               Card faceUp)
        AI function for CPU player to decide whether to call trump on the first round
        Parameters:
        suit - the facUp card's suit
        Returns:
        true if CPU decides to call trump

      • handsDownTheBest

        public char handsDownTheBest(char suit)
        determines if one trump suit would be way better than any other suit for this hand
        Parameters:
        suit - the suit of the faceUp card
        Returns:
        the suit being called trump, or the null character for a pass
